about.name: Josh Smith
about.title: Undergraduate Student at Murdoch University
about.description: Currently in my second year of university, studying a Bachelor of IT with a Computer Science Major. I'm a passionate learner with excellent critical thinking skills. I'm also hardworking and am able to work well under pressure. Currently focused on expanding my knowledge in the IT industry, specifically programming, picking up as many skills as i can along the way.
about.socials: Here are my socials if you want to stalk me

card2.desc: Serving as a Customer Service Attendant. Working on event days such as AFL assisting patrons.

card4.title: WACE

card5.title: Bachelor of IT at Murdoch University
card5.desc: Currently undergoing and commencing my second year after achieving ideal results in the previous year.

projects.title: Projects
projects.desc: See what I've been up to in my free time

card1.title: s&box Fishing Minigame
card1.body: Made with an intention to be included in a bigger collaborative project, this minigame plans to have 2+ players fish in a pond, catching fish to gain points and win.

card2.title: Natural Selection Simulation
card2.body: A console program which will demonstrate evolution and natural selection. Currently, Entities are placed on a 25x25 plane and simply roam around. This is displayed on text files for each iteration.
